alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 4:13PM EDT until June 13 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Southern Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Southwestern Grady County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Chattahoochee, or 14 miles northwest of Quincy, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Attapulgus, Darsey, Concord, Jamieson, Recovery, Faceville, Laingkat, Calvary, Reno, Fowlstown, Princes Still, Amsterdam, Nickleville, Dogtown, Mount Pleasant and Branchville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
